com.soebes.maven.extensions.deployer

Class MavenDeployer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.eventspy.AbstractEventSpy
      • com.soebes.maven.extensions.deployer.MavenDeployer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.eventspy.EventSpy

    @Singleton
@Named
public class MavenDeployer
extends org.apache.maven.eventspy.AbstractEventSpy
    This EventSpy implementation will handle the events of SessionEnd to identify the correct point in time to deploy all artifacts of the project into the given remote repository. This will also work if you are using plugins which define their own lifecycle.
    Author:
    Karl Heinz Marbaise khmarbaise@apache.org
